57  @Category(MediumTests.class)
58  public class TestImportExport {
59    private static final HBaseTestingUtility UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtility();
60    private static final byte[] ROW1 = Bytes.toBytes("row1");
61    private static final byte[] ROW2 = Bytes.toBytes("row2");
62    private static final String FAMILYA_STRING = "a";
63    private static final String FAMILYB_STRING = "b";
64    private static final byte[] FAMILYA = Bytes.toBytes(FAMILYA_STRING);
65    private static final byte[] FAMILYB = Bytes.toBytes(FAMILYB_STRING);
66    private static final byte[] QUAL = Bytes.toBytes("q");
67    private static final String OUTPUT_DIR = "outputdir";
68    private static final String EXPORT_BATCH_SIZE = "100";
69  
70    private static MiniHBaseCluster cluster;
71    private static long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
72  
73    @BeforeClass
74    public static void beforeClass() throws Exception {
75      cluster = UTIL.startMiniCluster();
76      UTIL.startMiniMapReduceCluster();
77    }
78  
79    @AfterClass
80    public static void afterClass() throws Exception {
81      UTIL.shutdownMiniMapReduceCluster();
82      UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
83    }
84  
85    @Before
86    @After
87    public void cleanup() throws Exception {
88      FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(UTIL.getConfiguration());
89      fs.delete(new Path(OUTPUT_DIR), true);
90    }
91  
92    /**
93     * When running on Hadoop 2, we need to copy (or add) configuration values for keys
94     * that start with "yarn." (from the map reduce minicluster) to the
95     * configuration that will be used during the test (from the HBase minicluster). 
96     * YARN configuration values are set properly in the map reduce minicluster, 
97     * but not necessarily in the HBase mini cluster.
98     * @param srcConf the configuration to copy from (the map reduce minicluster version)
99     * @param destConf the configuration to copy to (the HBase minicluster version)
100    */
101   private void copyConfigurationValues(Configuration srcConf, Configuration destConf) {
102     Iterator<Map.Entry<String,String>> it = srcConf.iterator();
103     while (it.hasNext()) {
104       Map.Entry<String, String> entry = it.next();
105       String key = entry.getKey();
106       String value = entry.getValue();
107       if (key.startsWith("yarn.") && !value.isEmpty()) {
108         destConf.set(key, value);
109       }
110     }
111   }
112 
113   /**
114    * Test simple replication case with column mapping
115    * @throws Exception
116    */
117   @Test
118   public void testSimpleCase() throws Exception {
119     String EXPORT_TABLE = "exportSimpleCase";
120     HTable t = UTIL.createTable(Bytes.toBytes(EXPORT_TABLE), FAMILYA);
121     Put p = new Put(ROW1);
122     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now, QUAL);
123     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+1, QUAL);
124     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+2, QUAL);
125     t.put(p);
126     p = new Put(ROW2);
127     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now, QUAL);
128     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+1, QUAL);
129     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+2, QUAL);
130     t.put(p);
131 
132     String[] args = new String[] {
133         EXPORT_TABLE,
134         OUTPUT_DIR,
135         "1000", // max number of key versions per key to export
136     };
137 
138     GenericOptionsParser opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
139     Configuration conf = opts.getConfiguration();
140 
141     // copy or add the necessary configuration values from the map reduce config to the hbase config
142     copyConfigurationValues(UTIL.getConfiguration(), conf);
143     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
144 
145     Job job = Export.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
146     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
147     job.waitForCompletion(false);
148     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
149 
150 
151     String IMPORT_TABLE = "importTableSimpleCase";
152     t = UTIL.createTable(Bytes.toBytes(IMPORT_TABLE), FAMILYB);
153     args = new String[] {
154         "-D" + Import.CF_RENAME_PROP + "="+FAMILYA_STRING+":"+FAMILYB_STRING,
155         IMPORT_TABLE,
156         OUTPUT_DIR
157     };
158 
159     opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
160     conf = opts.getConfiguration();
161 
162     // copy or add the necessary configuration values from the map reduce config to the hbase config
163     copyConfigurationValues(UTIL.getConfiguration(), conf);
164     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
165 
166     job = Import.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
167     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
168     job.waitForCompletion(false);
169     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
170 
171     Get g = new Get(ROW1);
172     g.setMaxVersions();
173     Result r = t.get(g);
174     assertEquals(3, r.size());
175     g = new Get(ROW2);
176     g.setMaxVersions();
177     r = t.get(g);
178     assertEquals(3, r.size());
179   }
180 
181   /**
182    * Test export .META. table
183    * 
184    * @throws Exception
185    */
186   @Test
187   public void testMetaExport() throws Exception {
188     String EXPORT_TABLE = ".META.";
189     String[] args = new String[] { EXPORT_TABLE, OUTPUT_DIR, "1", "0", "0" };
190     GenericOptionsParser opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(
191         cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
192     Configuration conf = opts.getConfiguration();
193 
194     // copy or add the necessary configuration values from the map reduce config to the hbase config
195     copyConfigurationValues(UTIL.getConfiguration(), conf);
196     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
197 
198     Job job = Export.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
199     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
200     job.waitForCompletion(false);
201     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
202   }
203 
204   /**
205    * Test export scanner batching
206    */
207    @Test
208    public void testExportScannerBatching() throws Exception {
209     String BATCH_TABLE = "exportWithBatch";
210     HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(BATCH_TABLE);
211     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILYA)
212         .setMaxVersions(1)
213     );
214     UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().createTable(desc);
215     HTable t = new HTable(UTIL.getConfiguration(), BATCH_TABLE);
216 
217     Put p = new Put(ROW1);
218     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now, QUAL);
219     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+1, QUAL);
220     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+2, QUAL);
221     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+3, QUAL);
222     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+4, QUAL);
223     t.put(p);
224 
225     String[] args = new String[] {
226         "-D" + Export.EXPORT_BATCHING + "=" + EXPORT_BATCH_SIZE,  // added scanner batching arg.
227         BATCH_TABLE,
228         OUTPUT_DIR
229     };
230  
231     GenericOptionsParser opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
232     Configuration conf = opts.getConfiguration();
233     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
234     assertEquals(conf.get(Export.EXPORT_BATCHING), EXPORT_BATCH_SIZE);
235 
236     Job job = Export.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
237     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
238     job.waitForCompletion(false);
239     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
240     
241     FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(UTIL.getConfiguration());
242     fs.delete(new Path(OUTPUT_DIR), true);
243   }
244 
245   @Test
246   public void testWithDeletes() throws Exception {
247     String EXPORT_TABLE = "exportWithDeletes";
248     HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(EXPORT_TABLE);
249     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILYA)
250         .setMaxVersions(5)
251         .setKeepDeletedCells(true)
252     );
253     UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().createTable(desc);
254     HTable t = new HTable(UTIL.getConfiguration(), EXPORT_TABLE);
255 
256     Put p = new Put(ROW1);
257     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now, QUAL);
258     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+1, QUAL);
259     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+2, QUAL);
260     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+3, QUAL);
261     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+4, QUAL);
262     t.put(p);
263 
264     Delete d = new Delete(ROW1, now+3, null);
265     t.delete(d);
266     d = new Delete(ROW1);
267     d.deleteColumns(FAMILYA, QUAL, now+2);
268     t.delete(d);
269     
270     String[] args = new String[] {
271         "-D" + Export.RAW_SCAN + "=true",
272         EXPORT_TABLE,
273         OUTPUT_DIR,
274         "1000", // max number of key versions per key to export
275     };
276 
277     GenericOptionsParser opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
278     Configuration conf = opts.getConfiguration();
279 
280     // copy or add the necessary configuration values from the map reduce config to the hbase config
281     copyConfigurationValues(UTIL.getConfiguration(), conf);
282     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
283 
284     Job job = Export.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
285     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
286     job.waitForCompletion(false);
287     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
288 
289 
290     String IMPORT_TABLE = "importWithDeletes";
291     desc = new HTableDescriptor(IMPORT_TABLE);
292     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILYA)
293         .setMaxVersions(5)
294         .setKeepDeletedCells(true)
295     );
296     UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().createTable(desc);
297     t.close();
298     t = new HTable(UTIL.getConfiguration(), IMPORT_TABLE);
299     args = new String[] {
300         IMPORT_TABLE,
301         OUTPUT_DIR
302     };
303 
304     opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
305     conf = opts.getConfiguration();
306 
307     // copy or add the necessary configuration values from the map reduce config to the hbase config
308     copyConfigurationValues(UTIL.getConfiguration(), conf);
309     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
310 
311     job = Import.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
312     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
313     job.waitForCompletion(false);
314     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
315 
316     Scan s = new Scan();
317     s.setMaxVersions();
318     s.setRaw(true);
319     ResultScanner scanner = t.getScanner(s);
320     Result r = scanner.next();
321     KeyValue[] res = r.raw();
322     assertTrue(res[0].isDeleteFamily());
323     assertEquals(now+4, res[1].getTimestamp());
324     assertEquals(now+3, res[2].getTimestamp());
325     assertTrue(res[3].isDelete());
326     assertEquals(now+2, res[4].getTimestamp());
327     assertEquals(now+1, res[5].getTimestamp());
328     assertEquals(now, res[6].getTimestamp());
329     t.close();
330   }
331 
332   @Test
333   public void testWithFilter() throws Exception {
334     String EXPORT_TABLE = "exportSimpleCase_ImportWithFilter";
335     HTableDescriptor desc = new HTableDescriptor(EXPORT_TABLE);
336     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILYA).setMaxVersions(5));
337     UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().createTable(desc);
338     HTable exportTable = new HTable(UTIL.getConfiguration(), EXPORT_TABLE);
339 
340     Put p = new Put(ROW1);
341     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now, QUAL);
342     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now + 1, QUAL);
343     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now + 2, QUAL);
344     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now + 3, QUAL);
345     p.add(FAMILYA, QUAL, now + 4, QUAL);
346     exportTable.put(p);
347 
348     String[] args = new String[] { EXPORT_TABLE, OUTPUT_DIR, "1000" };
349 
350     GenericOptionsParser opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(
351         cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
352     Configuration conf = opts.getConfiguration();
353     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
354 
355     Job job = Export.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
356     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
357     job.waitForCompletion(false);
358     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
359 
360     String IMPORT_TABLE = "importWithFilter";
361     desc = new HTableDescriptor(IMPORT_TABLE);
362     desc.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor(FAMILYA).setMaxVersions(5));
363     UTIL.getHBaseAdmin().createTable(desc);
364 
365     HTable importTable = new HTable(UTIL.getConfiguration(), IMPORT_TABLE);
366     args = new String[] { "-D" + Import.FILTER_CLASS_CONF_KEY + "=" + PrefixFilter.class.getName(),
367         "-D" + Import.FILTER_ARGS_CONF_KEY + "=" + Bytes.toString(ROW1), IMPORT_TABLE, OUTPUT_DIR,
368         "1000" };
369 
370     opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
371     conf = opts.getConfiguration();
372     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
373 
374     job = Import.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
375     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
376     job.waitForCompletion(false);
377     assertTrue(job.isSuccessful());
378 
379     // get the count of the source table for that time range
380     PrefixFilter filter = new PrefixFilter(ROW1);
381     int count = getCount(exportTable, filter);
382 
383     Assert.assertEquals("Unexpected row count between export and import tables", count,
384       getCount(importTable, null));
385 
386     // and then test that a broken command doesn't bork everything - easier here because we don't
387     // need to re-run the export job
388 
389     args = new String[] { "-D" + Import.FILTER_CLASS_CONF_KEY + "=" + Filter.class.getName(),
390         "-D" + Import.FILTER_ARGS_CONF_KEY + "=" + Bytes.toString(ROW1) + "", EXPORT_TABLE,
391         OUTPUT_DIR, "1000" };
392 
393     opts = new GenericOptionsParser(new Configuration(cluster.getConfiguration()), args);
394     conf = opts.getConfiguration();
395     args = opts.getRemainingArgs();
396 
397     job = Import.createSubmittableJob(conf, args);
398     job.getConfiguration().set("mapreduce.framework.name", "yarn");
399     job.waitForCompletion(false);
400     assertFalse("Job succeeedd, but it had a non-instantiable filter!", job.isSuccessful());
401 
402     // cleanup
403     exportTable.close();
404     importTable.close();
405   }
406 
407   /**
408    * Count the number of keyvalues in the specified table for the given timerange
409    * @param start
410    * @param end
411    * @param table
412    * @return
413    * @throws IOException
414    */
415   private int getCount(HTable table, Filter filter) throws IOException {
416     Scan scan = new Scan();
417     scan.setFilter(filter);
418     ResultScanner results = table.getScanner(scan);
419     int count = 0;
420     for (Result res : results) {
421       count += res.size();
422     }
423     results.close();
424     return count;
425   }
